title: In good company
brief_description: A recruiting film made to encourage young men to join the Army as officers. Shows the Officers Training School at Portsea in Victoria, the Royal Military College at Duntroon in Canberra and gives an insight into the lifestyle and career opportunities offered by the Army to any young man who wishes both to further his education at a tertiary level as well as seek a challenging and rewarding career as an officer in the Australian Army.
